original_text: A Jewish man called Mordecai lived in Susa. He was the son of Jair. Jair was the son of Shimei. Shimei was the son of Kish. Kish was a descendant of Benjamin.
korean_text: 도성 수산에 한 유다인이 있으니 이름은 모르드개라 그는 베냐민 자손이니 기스의 증손이요 시므이의 손자요 야일의 아들이라

sentences.original_text: A Jewish man called Mordecai lived in Susa
He was the son of Jair
Jair was the son of Shimei
Shimei was the son of Kish
Kish was a descendant of Benjamin
